description: This file defines a DashboardScreen widget for a Flutter application, providing a user interface for the dashboard page, including cards for different sections and localized text.

classes.name: DashboardScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the user's dashboard landing page, displaying various cards and info sections.

methods.name: _card
methods.description: A private helper method that builds a card widget with a title, subtitle, icon, and color.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the dashboard screen, including app bar, drawer, and main content.
